document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed at least six people and wounded 23 more at a military hospital in a heavily guarded area of kabul on saturday, security officials said, the worst attack in the afghan capital in months.
document.title: suicide bomber kills at least 6 in kabul hospital
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed at least six people and wounded 23 more at a military hospital in a heavily guarded area of kabul on saturday, security officials said, the worst attack in the afghan capital in months.
